synopsis.text: Kijuushi-tachi, the noble musketeers in "Senjuushi: Kijuushi-tachi no Happy Birthday!", embark on a secret mission to arrange a surprise birthday bash for their revered Master. The news, intended to be a secret, spreads like wildfire, inspiring everyone to contribute in their unique ways. While some musketeers, including Charleville, Brown Bess, Kentucky, and Springfield, are sent on a mission, the rest stay back to prepare for the grand celebration. Dreyse, Chassepot, Tabati√®re, and Lorenz aim to bake the perfect cake, while Ekaterina, Aleksandr, and Furusato craft a beautiful handmade gift. The twins, Noel and Nicola, along with Cane, rehearse stunning magic tricks, and Ieyasu, Hidetada, and Yukimura attempt to catch fish for a sumptuous feast. However, with just a few days left and unexpected mishaps threatening their plans, will the musketeers succeed in hosting a memorable and noble birthday party for their Master? This unaired episode promises a heartwarming and hilarious slice-of-life story, set after the events of episode 6.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
